cluster_classes.class_description: Key components of a specific urban legend scenario, including the protagonists, setting, and triggering information source within the same narrative.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: The tale typically involves a young couple parked in a secluded area when they hear a news report about an escaped criminal.

members.entity_description: A pair of young people featured as protagonists in the urban legend scenario.
A remote, isolated location where the young couple is parked in the legend.
A broadcast message that informs the couple about the escaped criminal.

cluster_classes.class_description: Psychological and narrative elements related to mystery, the unknown, and enjoyable fear that sustain the appeal of urban legends.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: All reference the unknown, mysteries, and the thrill or appeal that keep urban legends popular.

members.entity_description: Attractive pull of unexplained or mysterious aspects of stories.
Enjoyable excitement people experience when frightened by stories.
Unexplained or mysterious aspects of reality that urban legends frequently explore.
Unresolved questions and enigmatic situations that sustain the appeal of urban legends.

cluster_classes.class_description: Constituent elements in cautionary urban legend narratives, including vulnerable targets and the lures or objects used to entice them.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Stories of strangers luring children with candy ... warn listeners about the dangers that lurk

members.entity_description: Sweet treats used as bait by strangers in cautionary urban legend narratives.
Young individuals portrayed as vulnerable targets in the candy-luring urban legend.

args.new_description: Constituent narrative elements of specific urban legend scenarios, including protagonists, vulnerable targets, settings, and lures or information sources that trigger or drive the story.
args.justification: Both classes enumerate concrete roles, settings, and objects within specific urban legend scenarios (e.g., young couple, children, secluded area, candy) and serve the same function as narrative scenario elements, so they should be unified into a single, broader class.
The merged class represents concrete components of urban legend narratives and should be grouped under a shared Urban Legends class_group to align with related thematic classes.
This class captures psychological and thematic aspects that sustain the appeal of urban legends, so it should share the same Urban Legends class_group as the narrative scenario elements.

executed_decisions.justification: Both classes enumerate concrete roles, settings, and objects within specific urban legend scenarios (e.g., young couple, children, secluded area, candy) and serve the same function as narrative scenario elements, so they should be unified into a single, broader class.
The merged class represents concrete components of urban legend narratives and should be grouped under a shared Urban Legends class_group to align with related thematic classes.
This class captures psychological and thematic aspects that sustain the appeal of urban legends, so it should share the same Urban Legends class_group as the narrative scenario elements.
